languages.text: "Служители культа не посвящают мне подобных в свои таинства. Я благодарен им за службу Богу-Императору, но... если честно, не могу разделить их любовь к смерти. Слишком мне жить нравится".

"The cultists don't let people like me in on their rites and mysteries. I'm grateful to them for their service to the God-Emperor, but... to be honest, I can't get behind their love of death. I'm much too fond of living."
languages.original_text: "Служители культа не посвящают мне подобных в свои таинства. Я благодарен им за службу Богу-Императору, но... если честно, не могу разделить их любовь к смерти. Слишком мне жить нравится".

traits.locale_text: "The cultists don't let in people like me on their rites and mysteries. I'm grateful to them for their service to the God-Emperor, but... to be honest, I can't get behind their love of death. I'm much too fond of living."

"The cultists don't let in people like me on their rites and mysteries. I'm grateful to them for their service to the God-Emperor, but... to be honest, I can't get behind their love of death. I'm much too fond of living."

"The cultists don't let people like me in on their rites and mysteries. I'm grateful to them for their service to the God-Emperor, but... to be honest, I can't get behind their love of death. I'm much too fond of living."

languages.text: «Los cultistas no dejan que la gente como yo sepa nada de sus ritos y sus misterios. Les estoy agradecido por su servicio al Dios Emperador, pero... la verdad, no apoyo su amor a la muerte. A mí me gusta mucho la vida».
languages.original_text: "The cultists don't let people like me in on their rites and mysteries. I'm grateful to them for their service to the God-Emperor, but... to be honest, I can't get behind their love of death. I'm much too fond of living."

traits.locale_text: «Los cultistas no dejan que la gente como yo sepa nada de sus ritos y sus misterios. Les estoy agradecido por su servicio al Dios Emperador, pero... la verdad, no apoyo su amor a la muerte. A mí me gusta mucho la vida».

languages.text: 「カルト教団は、俺らのような人間には儀式も秘儀も教えちゃくれない。連中の神帝陛下への奉仕には感謝しているが…正直なところ、連中の死に対する愛には賛同できん。俺は生きていることがよっぽど好きだ」
languages.original_text: "The cultists don't let people like me in on their rites and mysteries. I'm grateful to them for their service to the God-Emperor, but... to be honest, I can't get behind their love of death. I'm much too fond of living."

traits.locale_text: 「カルト教団は、俺らのような人間には儀式も秘儀も教えちゃくれない。連中の神帝陛下への奉仕には感謝しているが…正直なところ、連中の死に対する愛には賛同できん。俺は生きていることがよっぽど好きだ」

languages.text: “那些教派成员不允许像我这样的人参加他们的神秘仪式。他们认真侍奉神皇，我对此很感激，但……老实说，我实在理解不了他们怎么会对死亡那么上心。我还是觉得活着更好。”
languages.original_text: "The cultists don't let people like me in on their rites and mysteries. I'm grateful to them for their service to the God-Emperor, but... to be honest, I can't get behind their love of death. I'm much too fond of living."

traits.locale_text: “那些教派成员不允许像我这样的人参加他们的神秘仪式。他们认真侍奉神皇，我对此很感激，但……老实说，我实在理解不了他们怎么会对死亡那么上心。我还是觉得活着更好。”

languages.text: "Die Kultisten weihen Leute wie mich nicht in ihre Riten und Geheimnisse ein. Ich bin dankbar für ihre Dienste für den Gottimperator, aber ... ganz ehrlich, ich verstehe ihre Liebe zum Tod nicht. Dazu lebe ich viel zu gern."
languages.original_text: "The cultists don't let people like me in on their rites and mysteries. I'm grateful to them for their service to the God-Emperor, but... to be honest, I can't get behind their love of death. I'm much too fond of living."

traits.locale_text: "Die Kultisten weihen Leute wie mich nicht in ihre Riten und Geheimnisse ein. Ich bin dankbar für ihre Dienste für den Gottimperator, aber ... ganz ehrlich, ich verstehe ihre Liebe zum Tod nicht. Dazu lebe ich viel zu gern."

languages.text: « Les cultistes ne parlent pas de leurs rituels et de leurs secrets à des gens comme moi. Je leur suis reconnaissant de servir l'Empereur-Dieu, mais... pour tout vous avouer, j'ai un peu de mal avec cette fascination pour la mort. Moi, j'aime beaucoup trop vivre. »
languages.original_text: "The cultists don't let people like me in on their rites and mysteries. I'm grateful to them for their service to the God-Emperor, but... to be honest, I can't get behind their love of death. I'm much too fond of living."

traits.locale_text: « Les cultistes ne parlent pas de leurs rituels et de leurs secrets à des gens comme moi. Je leur suis reconnaissant de servir l'Empereur-Dieu, mais... pour tout vous avouer, j'ai un peu de mal avec cette fascination pour la mort. Moi, j'aime beaucoup trop vivre. »

languages.text: "Tarikatçılar, benim gibi insanları ayinlerine ve sırlarına dâhil etmezler. Tanrı İmparator'a hizmetlerinden dolayı onlara müteşekkirim ancak... Dürüst olmam gerekirse ölüme duydukları sevgiye arka çıkamam. Yaşamaya pek düşkünümdür."
languages.original_text: "The cultists don't let people like me in on their rites and mysteries. I'm grateful to them for their service to the God-Emperor, but... to be honest, I can't get behind their love of death. I'm much too fond of living."
